text: The Top Latin Albums chart is a weekly music chart. It is published by Billboard magazine. It lists the top 50 albums released (primarily) by Hispanics in the United States. ==Number one albums== ;Key - Best-selling Latin album of the year ← 20092010201120122013 → Artist Album Reached number one Weeks at number one Dos Mundos: Evolución 1 Aventura The Last 4 Banda Los Recoditos ¡Ando Bien Pedo! 1 Aventura The Last 2 Chayanne No Hay Imposibles 2 featuring Ry Cooder San Patricio 4 Duelo Solamente Tú 1 El Trono de Mexico Quiero Decirte Que Te Amo 2 Daddy Yankee Mundial 4 Marc Anthony Iconos 6 Euphoria 7 Poquita Ropa 1 Euphoria 2 Luis Miguel 1 Euphoria 2 El Hombre Que Más Te Amó 1 En Total Plenitud 1 Shakira Sale el Sol 8 Artist Album Reached number one Weeks at number one Shakira Sale el Sol 4 Viva el Príncipe 2 Wisin & Yandel Los Vaqueros: El Regreso 1 Música + Alma + Sexo 2 Viva el Príncipe 5 Gloria 1 Morir y Existir: En Vivo 1 Prince Royce 1 Maná Drama y Luz 7 Aventura 14 + 14 1 Maná Drama y Luz 2 Un Nuevo Día 1 Tierra Firme 3 Prince Royce 4 Various artists Puros Trankazos 3 Entre Dios y el Diablo 3 Canciones Que Duelen 1 Independiente 2 Chino & Nacho Supremo 1 De Bohemia 1 Mi Amigo El Príncipe 1 Formula, Vol. 1 6 Artist Album Reached number one Weeks at number one Formula, Vol. 1 1 De Miles a Uno 1 Formula, Vol. 1 3 La Arrolladora Banda el Limón de René Camacho Irreversible...2012 2 Formula, Vol. 1 7 Desnuda 1 Selena Enamorada de Ti 1 Phase II 3 Don Omar Presents MTO²: New Generation 3 ==References== * For information about every week of this chart, follow this link; in the chart date section select a date and the top ten positions for the week selected will appear on screen, including the number-one album, which is shown in the table above. title: List of number-one Billboard Latin Albums from the 2010s
